After visiting Cala del Vermut on my last visit to Barcelona this was on the top of my list of restaurants for my recent trip.  It was so good I went three separate times on this visit.  The food is amazing as are the drinks.  I recommend the house made Vermut.  If you are interested in sangria be prepared for a large glass with a kick.  The restaurant does not have a menu so be prepared to point to the food and be prepared for an amazing experience.
